pr_title: DSJ-1 : Cleanup Netex Import tp prepare for import of DatedServiceJourneies

timeline.message: Clean code: Move CalendarMapper to calendar package.
Clean code: Add @Nullable on Netex import methods.
Clean code: Add `final` on Netex import where appropriate.
Clean code: Add missing generic type arguments in the Netex import.
Clean code: Use `List.of()` and `Set.of()` in the Netex import.

Clean code: Rename Feed scope for tests to "F" instead of "TEST". This make it easier to read tests and focus on the logic of the test. This make it a little less safe, but we have already made it real hard to use the test feed scope in production - it should not be a problem.
Clean code: Use the one arg constructor on `ServiceDate` with typed arguments, it is safer than using the 3 args int constructor - it is also easier to read.
Clean code: Reformat code - no logic changed, only white-space.
Clean code: Cleanup `ValidityComparator` so it is more readable. There is good unit-test coverage on this, so refactoring is safe.
Clean code: Add `toString()` to the Netex import hierarchical types for easier debugging.
Clean code: Remove unused parameters in NetexModule.
doc: Add design doc to NeTEx the netex import, and move the NetexBundle to root package.
clean code: Move mapping from loader to root. The process is load and map, not map as part of loading.
clean code: Create package `index` for all classes used to index entities. The loader build the index, and the mapper maps it to the OTP model.
clean code: Rename `utils` to `hierarchy`. The Hierarchy support arranging data into a hierarchical data structure, throwing away entities when done loading and mapping one "level".
clean code: Move Netex classes into loader, index and mapping packages based on where they belong.
clean code: Move Netex classes into loader, index and mapping packages based on where tey belong.
clean code: Make Netex mapping classes package local, if suitable.
clean code: Move Netex index interfaces/api classes into the index.api package. This prevent cyclic dependencies and allow for a cleaner dependency graph.
clean code: Move Netex index interfaces/api classes into the index.api package. This prevent cyclic dependencies and allow for a cleaner dependency graph.

timeline.author: t2gran
